text:
<!channel> Hi everyone! Tonight is the last day of Sprint 1, and tomorrow we will have our Retrospective, Sprint Review, and Sprint Planning (Sprint #2) at 9 PM on Zoom. Please make time to attend this meeting as we want to gather as a team to discuss the accomplishments that we have done for this current Sprint and talk about the strengths and improvements that we can instill for next Sprint.

TLDR:
Meeting *Thursday, May 23rd at 9 PM on Zoom!*
Issue #15, #19, #20 are still to be done by tonight.

elements.text:
Hi everyone! Tonight is the last day of Sprint 1, and tomorrow we will have our Retrospective, Sprint Review, and Sprint Planning (Sprint #2) at 9 PM on Zoom. Please make time to attend this meeting as we want to gather as a team to discuss the accomplishments that we have done for this current Sprint and talk about the strengths and improvements that we can instill for next Sprint.

TLDR:
Meeting
Thursday, May 23rd at 9 PM on Zoom!
